attributes.action: imprive ambualnce provision in clacton on sea and surrounding ateas
attributes.additional_details: People of this area are waiting too long for ambulance services. People left lying in roads and on floors for a couple of hours after accidents is not acceptable and can be stopped. We agree that the ambulance service is vital and applaud the work that the crews undertake but they need more staff and resources to help with the extreme pressure put on the service in this ever expanding area. Please help to fight for more provision of ambulances and staff and recognise the staff for heir great work and commitment to the NHS
